about.details:
Founded in 2007, Envirotech Systems Limited manufactures noise measurement and control solutions for industrial and commercial applications.

Envirotech Systems specializes in the design and supply of custom enclosures for noise reduction in machinery and mechanical equipment, suitable for both indoor and outdoor applications. The company's product list includes Noise Test Booth, Engine Test Room Acoustics, Anechoic & Semi-anechoic Chamber, Acoustic Enclosure, Envirotech Noise Barriers, Poly Carbonate Noise Barriers, Metallic Noise Barrier, Echo Barrier, Acoustic Louvers, And Envirotech Metal Doors.

The company offers its services across India and has a track record of successful projects in industries such as oil and gas, manufacturing, power generation, cement and steel, automotive and construction.

Competitive Strengths:

  • Early entry into the Acoustic Insulation sector has given the company a distinct competitive advantage.
  • The promoters have more than two decades of valuable experience in the industry, giving the company an in-depth understanding of market dynamics.
  • An accomplished technical team with a wealth of experience in project execution ensures competent project execution across a wide spectrum.
  • A strong commitment to research and development and continuous product development that enables the company to remain at the forefront of innovation.
  • The company has entered into strategic partnerships with industry experts that enhance its technical expertise and market knowledge.
  • All product ranges undergo rigorous testing and receive certifications from recognized government bodies that confirm their quality and reliability.
  • An extensive customer database covering various segments underlines the company's strong market presence and trust.

The company employs over 98 people.

faqs.question: What is the Envirotech Systems IPO?
faqs.answer:
Envirotech Systems IPO is a SME IPO of 5400000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹30.24 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹56 per share. The minimum order quantity is 2000.

The IPO opens on September 13, 2024, and closes on September 19, 2024.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Envirotech Systems IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Envirotech Systems IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Envirotech Systems IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Envirotech Systems IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Envirotech Systems IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Envirotech Systems IPO?
faqs.answer: Envirotech Systems IPO lot size is 2000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,12,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Envirotech Systems IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Envirotech Systems IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Envirotech Systems IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Envirotech Systems IPO will be done on Friday, September 20, 2024, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Monday, September 23, 2024. Check the Envirotech Systems IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Envirotech Systems IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Envirotech Systems IPO listing date is on Tuesday, September 24, 2024.
